fields.name: Memory Match
fields.description: Test and improve your memory by matching pairs of cards. Find all matching pairs to complete the game.
fields.instructions: Click on cards to reveal them. Match pairs of identical cards. Remember the positions of cards you've seen to make matches more quickly. Complete all pairs to win!

fields.name: Breathing Exercise
fields.description: A guided breathing exercise to help you relax and reduce stress.
fields.instructions: Follow the animated circle as it expands and contracts. Breathe in as it expands, and out as it contracts. Try to maintain this rhythm for the duration of the exercise.

fields.name: Meditation Journey
fields.description: A peaceful meditation game that guides you through calming visualizations.
fields.instructions: Find a quiet place and get comfortable. Follow the guided visualization prompts. Use the spacebar to progress through the journey at your own pace.
